text: Imanadharaka purusa ani striya apasata ekamekance (sahayyaka ani) mitra aheta. Te cangalya gostinca adesa detata, ani va'ita gostimpasuna rokhatata. Namaja niyamitapane padhatata. Jakata ada karatata. Allaha ani tyacya paigambarance mhanane man'ya karatata. Asaca lokanvara allaha lavakaraca daya krpa karila. Nihsansaya allaha varcasvasali, hikamata balaganara ahe
